bills.title: Revise laws related to the publication process of certificate of need letters of intent
Constitutional amendment to revise investment restrictions of coal trust fund
Transfer a portion of ending fund balance into the coal trust fund
Revise resort tax eligibility and allow use for workforce housing
Provide income tax relief for property taxes paid
Require revenue interim committee to make a recommendation about property tax rates
Revise land use laws related to manufactured and factory built homes
Provide a tax credit for charitable gifts to public infrastructure
Revert revenue from coal tax to coal trust
Require reporting of building permits for appraisal information
Provide additional funding for the housing Montana fund
Generally revise vehicular traffic laws related to pedestrian crossings
Revise taxation of of certain telecommunications property
